name: Crystal Defense (itch) (Kenarf)
description:
Description

Crystal defense is a game created in 48 hours for the Mix and game jam. It is a mix between a match 3 and tower defense game. 

From the author

I really hope you'll enjoy the game, despite all possible bugs!

Music from the game:

We Three Celtic Kings by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
